description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的、河北省工商界组成的统战性、经济性、民间性的人民团体和商会组织。
description.en: A united front, economic, and non-governmental people's organization and chamber of commerce composed of members from Hebei's industrial and commercial circles, under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华全国工商业联合会

zh-cn: 中华全国工商业联合会
en: All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce

description.zh-cn: 河北省工商业联合会的上级机构。
description.en: The superior organization of the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce.

nodes.id: 中国共产党河北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党河北省委员会
en: Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 河北省工商业联合会的上级中共党组织。
description.en: The superior CPC party organization of the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，对河北省工商业联合会等组织进行领导。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which leads organizations such as the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，河北省工商业联合会的活动范围所在地。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China, where the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce operates.

description.zh-cn: 一种组织分类，河北省工商业联合会属于此类组织。
description.en: A classification of organization to which the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce belongs.

description.zh-cn: 一种组织分类，河北省工商业联合会属于此类组织。
description.en: A classification of organization to which the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce belongs.

relationships.target: 中华全国工商业联合会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框内容，中华全国工商业联合会是河北省工商业联合会的上级机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce is the superior organization of the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce.

relationships.target: 中国共产党河北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框内容，中国共产党河北省委员会是河北省工商业联合会的中共上级单位。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Hebei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China is the superior CPC unit of the Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 河北省工商业联合会是由中国共产党领导的组织。
description.en: The Hebei Federation of Industry and Commerce is an organization led by the Communist Party of China.
